trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be set to a value within a range.
trans-unit.target: 公开方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问的可以将设置为范围内的值的控件。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern>控件模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定控件的值是只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value is read-only; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值是只读的;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果能修改它。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value*> property when a large change is made, such as with the PAGE DOWN key.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值将加上或减去<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value*>属性发出显著的更改后，例如按下了 PAGE DOWN 键。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The large-change value supported by the control or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: 支持的控件或为 null 的显著更改值 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 如果该控件不支持是它。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum range value supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的最大范围值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value supported by the control or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support Maximum.
trans-unit.target: 支持的控件或为 null 的最大值 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 如果该控件不支持最大值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum range value supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的最小范围值。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value supported by the control or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support Minimum.
trans-unit.target: 支持的控件或为 null 的最小值 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 如果该控件不支持最小值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the control.
The actual value set depends on the control implementation.
trans-unit.target: 设置的实际值取决于控件的实现。

trans-unit.source: The control may round the requested `value` up or down.
trans-unit.target: 控件可能舍入请求`value`上移或下移。

trans-unit.source: When value is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当 value 小于最小值或大于控件的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value*> property when a small change is made, such as with an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值将加上或减去<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value*>属性时进行少量更改，例如按下了箭头键。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The small-change value or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support SmallChange.
trans-unit.target: 小更改值或 null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 如果该控件不支持 SmallChange。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the control.

The value of the control or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support Value.
trans-unit.target: 控件或为 null 的值 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 如果该控件不支持值。
